website_summaries.verdict: A hybrid of two iconic sports shoes, the Adidas Crestwood Mid is a stylish casual shoe that exudes classic basketball style. Built for the streets, this court-inspired pair could elevate a plain casual ensemble with its mid-top profile and eye-catching colorways.Moreover, this kick provides excellent comfort and extra ankle support that is ideal for all-day wear. Ultimately, if you are looking for a reasonably priced pair that is stylish and offers adequate comfort and support then Adidas Crestwood Mid might just fit the bill.
pros: A few found the shoe’s design to be unique which makes it stand out from the rest
Several purchasers find this pair’s materials and construction to be of excellent quality
Most of the wearers agree that it is a comfortable shoe
The Adidas Crestwood Mid is available in an array of colorways
A significant number of consumers said that this kick is very stylish
Some wearers were delighted that people give them compliments the first time they see the shoe
A good number of shoe users especially liked its mid-top profile as it provides extra support to their ankle area
One consumer mentioned that the shoe’s outsole supplies excellent grip
The Adidas Crestwood Mid is perceived by some buyers to be a good shoe offered at a reasonable price
cons: A handful of reviews stated that this kick feels too narrow for them

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shoes!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Adidas Crestwood Mid Shoes in Black/Gold/Black, 10.5. The gold on the back of the shoe is even prettier in person. I feel these shoes are kind of rare in my own head for the fact that I have never seen anybody wear shoes with a shiny gold back. The fit is just as expected and I do find myself wearing them all day on certain days even when I am not playing basketball. If you want to stand out, than buy these shoes and people will gravitate towards you to ask you where you purchased these beauties.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: Weared about 2x, really comfortable was worried if they weren't going to fit, but they did. Material is great, bottom has grip, however I tied the shoe laces through all the holes and their a little short, so have to tie them a different way to get more slack or buy other laces.but still worth it
customer_reviews.author: eman

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. The white pops out like eye candy. Feels really comfortable and looks fashionable. Great for those casual outings

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: KICKIN IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Adidas, the Strap on them sets a really nice trend & fashion hit. The Greys are not as bright as the stock photos, see others' photos for the accurate darker Grey they are.

customer_reviews.text: Finally, a comfortable shoe that lasts for my teenager. The look is way cool! Fits great.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe. I was a little skeptical at 1st but the shoe fits and it's a very nice build quality.

customer_reviews.title: I love the color and the material
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, out of all my shoes I wear these the most. I love the color and the material. Its at an affordable price and plus their comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: my son loves them especially the feel of the heel, i think they look like they could be way more expensive, great shoe at a good price, quick delivery.

customer_reviews.text: I bought these in black and gold and they fit perfect. They were only $100 when i got them and they're sexy af.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The back of the shoe split/torn open after only a few months. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Zachk

customer_reviews.title: I was relieved to find them on amazon but I really don't like to make purchases online
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. He saw them at a shoe store but since he wears a size 13 he is limited on what he can purchase. I was relieved to find them on amazon but I really don't like to make purchases online. Since he wanted them I thought I would buy them and see how they come. They were exactly what he wanted and fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Kicks
customer_reviews.text: White/Black/Scarlet - Size 11. Fits just right, with crew socks. The color scheme goes with any outfit that doesn't mind the red highlights. They look just as clean/stylish, if not better in person. Not too loud or obnoxious, comfortable for all-day casual wear or to play ball. I usually just wear walking shoes so the weight difference is notable, but expected.
customer_reviews.author: KNJC

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Men's Crestwood Mid Shoes
product_meta.description: These mid-cut men's shoes pay homage to the golden anniversary of football's Big Game. The sneakers feature a full grain leather upper, a neoprene tongue and heel, and metallic gold embellishments. Full grain leather upper Durable textile overlay on fore foot Neoprene tongue and heel Tonal ankle strap from eyestay to midsole Metallic gold details Grippy basketball-inspired rubber outsole Imported
feature_bullets: High-top sneaker in full-grain leather featuring perforated neoprene and woven straps at wide collar and heel
